It is full with 12 years old Russians

Easy to learn, challenging to master. Just hit 5 years and I still play this game more than any other. If you got some friends and wanna play a team based shooter, I have had by far the most fun playing this one. Community maps and posts also help to keep players engaged. A couple thousand hours logged and I'll probably log a couple thousand more!
